name: 1010 puzzle
description:
A fun and addictive puzzle game.

🔆 Time mode: score as much points as possible in 2 minutes ⏰
🔆 Challenge: compete with friends 👬
🔆 Develop: Improve your skills and turn on the brain
🔆 Rating: try to set a record 🏅
🔆 Missions: complete 50 tasks

📒 Rules:
Drag the blocks on the 10x10 grid and try to fill rows or columns. As you fill them, they will disappear 🎉  - try to clear as many lines as possible. You can clear up to 6 lines at once and receive more points for combos.
The game is over when there is no place for available blocks on the grid. In the time mode game will be finished in 2 minutes ⏳

Play for free whenever you got bored.

Some images designed by: freepik.com, flaticon.com
Music designed by: bensound.com
Fonts designed by: fonts.google.com
